lines.sourceText: Can those ears fan me in summer?
lines.sourceEnText: Can those ears fan me in summer?

lines.sourceText: I do not need a FLAG.
lines.sourceEnText: I do not need a FLAG.

lines.sourceText: Talk to all the animals. Maybe they know where the flag is.
lines.sourceEnText: Talk to all the animals. Maybe they know where the flag is.

lines.sourceText: When I was young I lived with my parents
lines.sourceEnText: When I was young I lived with my parents

lines.sourceText: Maybe one of them has it.
lines.sourceEnText: Maybe one of them has it.

lines.sourceText: Then I grew up with my mantle
lines.sourceEnText: Then I grew up with my mantle

lines.sourceText: I love watching the flag up there on the Iglica.
lines.sourceEnText: I love watching the flag up there on the Iglica.

lines.sourceText: Lions are the kings of the jungle!
lines.sourceEnText: Lions are the kings of the jungle!

lines.sourceText: I am the biggest land ANIMAL.
lines.sourceEnText: I am the biggest land ANIMAL.

lines.sourceText: I am tall, but not 90 meters like the IGLICA!
lines.sourceEnText: I am tall, but not 90 meters like the IGLICA!

lines.sourceText: It was on the IGLICA at CENTENNIAL HALL
lines.sourceEnText: It was on the IGLICA at CENTENNIAL HALL

lines.sourceText: the famous symbol of our city.
lines.sourceEnText: the famous symbol of our city.

lines.sourceText: There are more than 10000 ANIMALS here.
lines.sourceEnText: There are more than 10000 ANIMALS here.

lines.sourceText: But you did not find the FLAG.
lines.sourceEnText: But you did not find the FLAG.

lines.sourceText: Hehe! I'm not actually from the zoo.
lines.sourceEnText: Hehe! I'm not actually from the zoo.

lines.sourceText: I love to eat WATTLE leaves!
lines.sourceEnText: I love to eat WATTLE leaves!

lines.sourceText: I can't fly, but I swim well!
lines.sourceEnText: I can't fly, but I swim well!

lines.sourceText: I could not live on ice!
lines.sourceEnText: I could not live on ice!

lines.sourceText: But I didn't take it. You must find that FLAG!
lines.sourceEnText: But I didn't take it. You must find that FLAG!

lines.sourceText: Can you guess what tree I need to climb to get
lines.sourceEnText: Can you guess what tree I need to climb to get

lines.sourceText: I think I saw a treasure chest somewhere
lines.sourceEnText: I think I saw a treasure chest somewhere

lines.sourceText: Elephants have thick skin and big ears.
lines.sourceEnText: Elephants have thick skin and big ears.

lines.sourceText: I didn't see a flag anywhere.
lines.sourceEnText: I didn't see a flag anywhere.

lines.sourceText: Now I am an old Lion...
lines.sourceEnText: Now I am an old Lion...

lines.sourceText: No, I did not take the FLAG.
lines.sourceEnText: No, I did not take the FLAG.

lines.sourceText: Match the fruits to their trees!
lines.sourceEnText: Match the fruits to their trees!

lines.sourceText: I am a LION from AFRICA.
lines.sourceEnText: I am a LION from AFRICA.

lines.sourceText: Hi. I am the Zoo Director
lines.sourceEnText: Hi. I am the Zoo Director

lines.sourceText: I am a CHIMPANZEE. I climb TREES.
lines.sourceEnText: I am a CHIMPANZEE. I climb TREES.

lines.sourceText: I did not take the FLAG.
lines.sourceEnText: I did not take the FLAG.

lines.sourceText: They eat lots of different fruits.
lines.sourceEnText: They eat lots of different fruits.

lines.sourceText: I am a PENGUIN, a strange BIRD.
lines.sourceEnText: I am a PENGUIN, a strange BIRD.

lines.sourceText: Penguins are birds that can swim.
lines.sourceEnText: Penguins are birds that can swim.

lines.sourceText: Can you find the path in ICE?
lines.sourceEnText: Can you find the path in ICE?

lines.sourceText: It would be fun to climb that pole.
lines.sourceEnText: It would be fun to climb that pole.

lines.sourceText: My long NECK helps me reach leaves.
lines.sourceEnText: My long NECK helps me reach leaves.

lines.sourceText: GREAT! Now go back to the ZOO DIRECTOR.
lines.sourceEnText: GREAT! Now go back to the ZOO DIRECTOR.

lines.sourceText: LION. Lives in a PRIDE, a family of lions.
lines.sourceEnText: LION. Lives in a PRIDE, a family of lions.

lines.sourceText: Do you prefer to fly or to swim?!
lines.sourceEnText: Do you prefer to fly or to swim?!

lines.sourceText: THE FLAG? I do not have it.
lines.sourceEnText: THE FLAG? I do not have it.

lines.sourceText: I love the ICE and the COLD.
lines.sourceEnText: I love the ICE and the COLD.

lines.sourceText: They live near oceans and ice.
lines.sourceEnText: They live near oceans and ice.

lines.sourceText: They are the largest land animals.
lines.sourceEnText: They are the largest land animals.

lines.sourceText: Help me put the pieces together.
lines.sourceEnText: Help me put the pieces together.

lines.sourceText: With a NECK like that I could see my house from here!
lines.sourceEnText: With a NECK like that I could see my house from here!

lines.sourceText: Chimps have long arms to swing in trees.
lines.sourceEnText: Chimps have long arms to swing in trees.

lines.sourceText: But I did not take the FLAG!
lines.sourceEnText: But I did not take the FLAG!

lines.sourceText: and today we have a problem
lines.sourceEnText: and today we have a problem

lines.sourceText: Every fruit comes from a different tree.
lines.sourceEnText: Every fruit comes from a different tree.

lines.sourceText: and now the FLAG is back.
lines.sourceEnText: and now the FLAG is back.

lines.sourceText: They have long necks to eat leaves from tall trees.
lines.sourceEnText: They have long necks to eat leaves from tall trees.

lines.sourceText: Find the FLAG. Talk to the ANIMALS.
lines.sourceEnText: Find the FLAG. Talk to the ANIMALS.

lines.sourceText: Squawk! Red and yellow ran by!
lines.sourceEnText: Squawk! Red and yellow ran by!

lines.sourceText: I really love to eat fruits!
lines.sourceEnText: I really love to eat fruits!

lines.sourceText: If I took it I would REMEMBER!
lines.sourceEnText: If I took it I would REMEMBER!

lines.sourceText: Do you have a good MEMORY?
lines.sourceEnText: Do you have a good MEMORY?

lines.sourceText: Its EARS are bigger than me!
lines.sourceEnText: Its EARS are bigger than me!

lines.sourceText: Do you want to play again?
lines.sourceEnText: Do you want to play again?
